duties_responsibilities.duty: Contribute significantly to personal production, key channel relationships, as well as hiring, training, and developing a team of 5-25 Executive Consultants.
Attract memberships through channel partners, strategic alliances with state, trade, and professional associations, and partnerships with chambers of commerce.
Deliver business credit seminars to groups of 5-50 business owners and monitor and improve the sales performance of direct reports.
Develop sales strategies, manage the sales process through the J. Galt Sales App, and lead team meetings to meet monthly, quarterly, and annual sales targets.

skills.skill: Monthly, Quarterly, and Annual Sales Target Management

education_certification.credential: Minimum 10 years of successful business experience in a marketing-intensive business (Master's preferred)
